    • Method Detail

      • visibleSettingsFrame

        public static boolean visibleSettingsFrame()
        Returns:
        true if settingsframe is visible

      • createSettingsFrame

        public static void createSettingsFrame(boolean blocking,
                       boolean startup,
                       boolean alwaysOnTop)
        Creates a window that holds all settings and statistics.
        Parameters:
        blocking - true if this window should be blocking. false if it should run in parallel with other code
        startup - true if it is should not show statistics and show about text, false otherwise
        alwaysOnTop - true if it should be locked above all other windows

      • registerGraph

        public static void registerGraph(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String category,
                 java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Float> callFunction,
                 long collectTime)
        Registers a graph to be showed in the statistics panel of the settings frame
        Parameters:
        name - name of the graph
        category - category for the graph
        callFunction - the function that the graph will call to collect data
        collectTime - the sleep time(ms) in between collecting data.

      • registerSetting

        public static void registerSetting(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String category,
                   float min,
                   float max,
                   float current)
        Registers a setting to be shown in the Settings window
        Parameters:
        name - name of the setting
        category - category of the setting
        min - the minimum value that the setting can possibly have
        max - the maximum value that the setting can possibly have
        current - the default value of the setting

      • getSetting

        public static float getSetting(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String category)
        Gets the value of the setting
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the setting to search for
        category - the category to search in
        Returns:
        The value of the searched setting or 0.0f, f none found.
